EmailTemplate.name: Notice of Bad Cheque
EmailTemplate.subject: Bad Cheque Notice
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
To, Date: xxxx Client Name: {!Account.Name} Address: {!Account.BillingAddress} {!Account.BillingCity}, {!Account.BillingState}, {!Account.BillingCountry}
Sub: Notice of bounced check
Dear {!Account.Name},
This is to inform you that payment on your cheque No. xxxx drawn against Account No. xxxxxx with Bank Name in the amount of Rs. xxx tendered to us on date has not cleared.
Accordingly, we hereby request you to send us another cheque in the amount of xxxxx. The old cheque has been returned to you and your prompt attention in this matter is requested.
Thank you & Kind Regards,
